response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your endeavors. Given its value and significance, I propose a special introductory offer for you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at an exceptional price of $9,500. This is an opportunity not to be missed, considering the immense value it holds for you. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of bringing this product into your possession.", "product_price": 9500}
